title: ELEMENTAL

photo.imgAlt: Image from Music Gallery Desiderium performance

desc: Our debut concert, ELEMENTAL, for The Music Gallery's You In Mind series. The first half of the program features works by Matthew Shlomovitz, Pauline Oliveros, Julia Mermelstein, and Nolan Hildebrand. The second half featured our epic multimedia tribute to the four elements of nature, the Elemental Suite.

program.title: All Fours for the Drum Bum

shortDesc: Our debut concert, ELEMENTAL, for The Music Gallery's You In Mind series. The first half of the program features works by Matthew Shlomovitz, Pauline Oliveros, Julia Mermelstein, and Nolan Hildebrand. The second half featured our epic multimedia tribute to the four elements of nature, the Elemental Suite.

title: Behaviours: Play

program.title: 0 Damage Any % Reverse Glitch Speed Run

photo.imgAlt: Image from ArrayMusic Speed Run performance

desc: In February of 2024, we performed a program designed around the idea of play for ArrayMusic's Behaviours series. In this program we debuted our performance of Jet Kye Chong's Anticommunication, as well as two new compositions, Feedback Dreams and 0% Any Damage Reverse Glitch Speed Run.
shortDesc: In February of 2024, we performed a program designed around the idea of play for ArrayMusic's Behaviours series. In this program we debuted our performance of Jet Kye Chong's Anticommunication, as well as two new compositions, Feedback Dreams and 0% Any Damage Reverse Glitch Speed Run

title: Horse Idoling Zone
desc: We'll be playing a set at the next PonyHAUS show, Horse Idoling Zone! This show is a triple bill with G.A.G. and Daniel Tapper.
shortDesc: JOIN US AS WE SACRIFICE BODY AND SOUL TO THE EQUESTRIAN OVERLORDS. We'll be sharing the bill with G.A.G. along with visuals from Dan Tapper, in a space dedicated to the praise of ponies.

date: May - October 2024, 3rd Tuesday of the Month
title: PEOPLE SOUP

photo.imgAlt: Image from ArrayMusic Speed Run performance

desc: We will be one of the Ensembles in Residence at The TRANZAC from May to October of 2024. We'll be hosting a variety of shows, bringing together artists from different genres and backgrounds for six performances.
shortDesc: We will be one of the Ensembles in Residence at The TRANZAC from May to October of 2024. We'll be hosting a variety of shows, bringing together artists from different genres and backgrounds for six performances.

title: Fresh Ideas in Puppetry 2024
desc: We will be scoring a dramatic puppet performance following the birth, life, and many deaths of a paper puppet pal.
shortDesc: We will be scoring a dramatic puppet performance following the birth, life, and many deaths of a paper puppet pal.

title: Track Could Bend #92
desc: We will be performing an extended improvised set on garbage percussion, noisy electronics, and if you're lucky some ukulele. Come get turnt with us in a dank basement while we serenade the souls of the innocent.
shortDesc: We will be performing an extended improvised set on garbage percussion, noisy electronics, and if you're lucky some ukulele. Come get turnt with us in a dank basement while we serenade the souls of the innocent.

title: DIY Insrument Showcase
desc: We are building a new instrument based on the sound of a painter's canvas, in addition with some wackadoodle electronic integrations as to be expected.
shortDesc: We are building a new instrument based on the sound of a painter's canvas, in addition with some wackadoodle electronic integrations as to be expected.

title: Smash at Render File
desc: We performed an updated version of Speed Run for Super Smash Bros. Melee, along with Render File.

program.title: 0 Damage Any % Reverse Glitch Speed Run

shortDesc: We performed an updated version of Speed Run for Super Smash Bros. Melee, along with Render File.

title: DUO CICHORIUM'S PLAYSCAPE EMPORIUM
desc: We will be curating six interdisciplinary concerts at ArrayMusic between December 2024 and May 2027. We'll be exploring musical collaboration with many different arts, including dance, video games, puppetry, theater, poetry, paint, and more!!!!
shortDesc: We will be curating six interdisciplinary concerts at ArrayMusic between December 2024 and May 2027.
